overview:
CEO & Founder of JobeeHive.com

Vishwas comes with diverse experience across entrepreneurial, corporate & community spheres. Currently, the CEO of JobeeHive.com â€“ a fast growing employer and salary review web 2.0 platform. Founded JobeeHive.com in 2007. Prior to that, he worked with Huawei Technologies, Honeywell and Freescale Semiconductor.

A teenage entrepreneur, Vishwas started his first company InfoVision Academy, which successfully trained rural students in computers during 1999-2001. He graduated from RV College of Engineering, Bangalore, in 2003.
